messages.subject: A truly outstanding youtube vid "SHINSENGUMI SPROUTING"
messages.msgSnippet: This vid was recommended to me by freedomxfighter and I was glad to have gotten this tip http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SWHG8GDA_dg please give this a rating
messages.messageBody:
This vid was recommended to me by freedomxfighter and I was glad to
have gotten this tip

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SWHG8GDA_dg

please give this a rating and comment for a job well done!
I have favorited this vid to http://www.youtube.com/shinsengumihq
already.

I'm really impressed with this fanvid and interestingly it captures
alot of what the professional media released by NHK (for promo
purposes) could not do. MangakaRob really has a grasp of the best
ideals of the Shinsengumi.
